Description:
Detects scheduled task creation events that include suspicious actions, and is run once at 00:00

Author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Uncommon One Time Only Scheduled Task At 00:00
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%wscript%' or command like '%vbscript%' or command like '%cscript%' or command like '%wmic %' or command like '%wmic.exe%' or command like '%regsvr32.exe%' or command like '%powershell%' or command like '%\appdata\%') and (command like '%once%' and command like '%00:00%') and (process_path like '%\schtasks.exe%' and original_file_name = 'schtasks.exe'))
